{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.24128v1", "title": "Perfect circle-valued Morse functions on hyperbolic 6-manifolds", "summary": "We build the first example of a hyperbolic 6-manifold that admits a perfect
circle-valued Morse function, which can be considered as the analogue of a
fibration over the circle for manifolds with non-vanishing Euler
characteristic. As a consequence, we obtain a new example of a subgroup of a
hyperbolic group which is of type $\mathcal{F}_2$ but not $\mathcal{F}_3$.", "main_category": "math.GT", "categories": "math.GT,math.GR", "published": "2025-03-31T14:12:55Z"}
